      • getClosestAvailableStation

        public Station getClosestAvailableStation()
                                   throws NoSuchStationExistException
        This method browses the list of stations on the network and picks the one which is the closest to this Localization and contains at least one available parking slot.
        Returns:
        the closest Station with an available parking slot
        Throws:
        NoSuchStationExistException

      • getClosestAvailableStation

        public Station getClosestAvailableStation(boolean isPlus)
                                   throws NoSuchStationExistException
        This method browses the public list of stations on the network and picks the one of specified type which is the closest to this Localization and contains at least one available parking slot.
        Parameters:
        isPlus - true if the Station should be Plus, false otherwise
        Returns:
        the closest Station of given type with an available parking slot
        Throws:
        NoSuchStationExistException

      • getClosestStationWithBicycle

        public Station getClosestStationWithBicycle()
                                     throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        This method browses the public list of stations on the network and picks the one which is the closest to this Localization and contains at least one available bicycle.
        Returns:
        the closest Station with an available Bicycle
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • getClosestStationWithBicycle

        public Station getClosestStationWithBicycle(java.lang.String bicycleType)
                                     throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        This method browses the public list of stations on the network and picks the one which is the closest to this Localization and contains at least one available bicycle of specified type.
        Parameters:
        bicycleType - the type of bicycle desired, null if indifferent to the type
        Returns:
        the closest Station with an available Bicycle of given type
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

        public Localization generateLocInRadius(double radius)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Acts exactly as randomLocInCircle.generate(this,radius).
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius of the circular area
        Returns:
        A localization
        Throws:

      • barycenter

        public static Localization barycenter(java.util.ArrayList<Localization> locs)
        Returns a localization which is the barycenter of the localizations given in argument.
        Parameters:
        locs - the localizations to compute the barycenter of
        Returns:
